title: Dedication
sourceDesc: Butlerâ€™s [Fifteeen Sermons Preached at the Rolls Chapel] were first published in 1726. A second edition was produced in 1729, which included a new preface. A third edition of 1736 was simply a reprint of the second. A fourth edition of 1749 included six additional sermons preached on various occasions. This final edition is our copytext.
author: Joseph Butler

blocks.content:
To the Right Honourable
Sir Joseph Jekyll,
Master of the Rolls, &c.

The following Sermons, preached in his Chapel, are with all Humility Dedicated, 
   BY 
     his most dutiful, and 
       most obedient Servant, 
     Joseph Butler.
